title: Upcoming change to patch day
body:
**_TL:DR Starting with patch 5.16, Oceania will be the first region in the world to receive future patches. Our patch day will now be Wednesday mornings instead of Thursday mornings._**

Hey everyone,

I want to share an upcoming change to Oceania’s patch timing. Starting with the next patch, Oceania will be moving up from Thursdays to Wednesdays. We’re also taking the opportunity to shift downtime a bit to better match when most of you are offline. (Neat side-note: this means Oceania will be the first region in the world to receive future patches)

We'll provide more timing updates as we get closer to enacting this change.

If you have any questions about this let us know in the comments below!

Mindstar

replies.body: Hey look! Riot's doing something pretty cool that makes our server special, and they're also cleaning up patch times to inconvenience as few people as possible. I guess I better insult them! /s
logged in just to upvote
I never thought rito would be so nice to Oceania i thought we would be ignored for the rest of this games life.

And yet we still don't have a tribunal... OCE is the most toxic of all league servers by far, and all because this server wasn't started with a behavior regulatory system like EVERY OTHER SERVER.

This is nice, don't get me wrong, but when are we going to get something that really matters?

Hi ManiticusMaximus

We're actually doing quite a bit on this front.  There's a great [Player Behaviour FAQ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback) on our boards at the moment highlighting some of the systems we have in place and under development.

Have a read over it - it answers quite a few things along with "What is happening with Tribunal?"

Cheers!
Mindstar
I swear you guys have a ping system that alerts you every time someone says "no tribunal".
it wouldn't surprise me haha
Your name, bloody fantastic!! ahha

Special? Hah. 

What happens to the first server to receive a bugged patch? It gets disabled. What happens to the servers that haven't got the bugged patch? They have the patch delayed. Why make OCE, a relatively less populated server, receive patches first? Less micro-transactions lost during downtime as opposed to taking down NA. 

Yeah, we're special alright.
You misspelled Rito
Riot supposedly never cared about OCE but had an event specific to the region that has resulted in them spending millions of dollars to create an artificial reef because logic!

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=t2vBl3Ec,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-08-11T08:59:15.909+0000)
>
> Riot supposedly never cared about OCE but had an event specific to the region that has resulted in them spending millions of dollars to create an artificial reef because logic!

where's you source that it's going to cost millions of dollars? i highly doubt that
It's an educated guess but, quite honestly, I would be surprised if such a project didn't cost millions.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=t2vBl3Ec,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-11T10:29:42.622+0000)
>
> It's an educated guess but, quite honestly, I would be surprised if such a project didn't cost millions.

lol there's no way it's costing millions. 10's of thousands is more accurate.

> [{quoted}](name=Only Heimer,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=t2vBl3Ec,comment-id=00000001000000000001,timestamp=2015-08-11T16:13:41.222+0000)
>
> lol there's no way it's costing millions. 10's of thousands is more accurate.

Hundreds of those :)

Not the point though, we do care about OCE and this is not because we spend loads of money on event for the region (apart from the artificial reef, think about the Luna Park event and all our effort with the ISP to mention some...). We do care about OCE because we are players like you are and when there is something wrong with League in Oceania, we suffer from it as well and it is frustrating.
Add on top of it the feeling of letting you all down and you can imagine how hard we try not to have these feelings.

>Hundreds of those :)
Not the point though, we do care about OCE and this is not because we spend loads of money on event for the region (apart from the artificial reef, think about the Luna Park event and all our effort with the ISP to mention some...). We do care about OCE because we are players like you are and when there is something wrong with League in Oceania, we suffer from it as well and it is frustrating.
Add on top of it the feeling of letting you all down and you can imagine how hard we try not to have these feelings.

(I hope i used quotes right) Dont worry the community just doesnt appreciate these things! I love what your doing with the game :D!

I remember the event (though I couldn't find it in the news), and if I remember correctly it was largely players that funded "Riot's Reef". It was player participation that unlocked said reward, but it was also a percent of all RP purchases that funded it. 

Even still, it was a cool thing to do.
Nah, was not based on RP purchase. The event was to celebrate Oceania and have something special for our Oceanic players. The statue was a reward for participating, not spending.

I didn't say it was a reward for spending. I said it was a reward for participating, but it was funded by RP purchases. As in, RP purchases were what funded the building of the Nautilus statue. But I was wrong on the last bit though, thanks for the correction!

> it was funded by RP purchases.

You mean like literally EVERYTHING to do with LoL?
RITO LOVES US!
We do <3
I'm stoked for this! Riot's doing something nice for OCE! Cross your fingers guys, next time we might finally get a tribunal!
No server has a tribunal until the new tribunal is developed. So far from announcements ALL servers get the new tribunal at the same time.

Check out our player behaviour FAQ - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/L65wrRYe-player-behaviour-faq-updated-for-instant-feedback

It goes over everything currently live on our system, especially the new instant feedback system which will continually evolve. As Klavinmour said below the Tribunal as you knew it (players voting on cases) has been down for quite some time in all regions. They have since been replaced by multiple automatic systems and we are working to reintroduce the player voting part as well sometime in the future... soonâ„¢
What do you mean by "this means Oceania will be the first region in the world to receive future patches"?

It means when a patch goes out to live, OCE will get it one day earlier then the rest of the world. So if the patch comes out on lets say the 20th we'll get it that day then all the other severs get it on the 21st.

It is actually more like a few hours earlier.  Releasing a League of Legends patch is usually a 24+ hr affair now, as each region is released in succession.   In reality, we're simply moving Oceania to the front of that queue.

Additionally, the scheduling change will actually mean that patches are released at a better time of the week for the Oceanic region.  Having the patch go out on a Wednesday instead of a Thursday, for us, will mean that any issues that come up are more likely to get caught and fixed prior to the weekend.

Cheers
Mindstar
PBE still gets to test the updates first though or are we the new PBE? Are we just the first server to experience the patches/updates after PBE? Please Answer!

Hi Dark Caster,

That's correct - Oceania will be the first "live" server in the normal patch release schedule.  PBE will still be released roughly 2 weeks prior, as it is now.

So you're saying we're getting a PBE or is it still only available for NA, EU servers?

Please respond, 

Rifles

> So you're saying we're getting a PBE or is it still only available for NA, EU servers?

The answer to your question is actually in the comment you responded to. If you read it you'll notice Mindstar states "PBE will still be released roughly 2 weeks prior, as it is now." indicating there will be no "PBE addition" to OCE. (And why would there be? We're the lowest populated server. We don't even have normal draft...)
PBE is a patch ahead of everyone so yes they will test it before us, we only get it a day before everyone else{{champion:432}}
Does this mean we are the first to try out new champs?
After the PBE, yes. (By a few hours that is.)
is this so you have time to check for bugs before the bigger servers have to experience them?

> [{quoted}](name=REVERSEDTURTLE,realm=OCE,application-id=3fteLeTW,discussion-id=t2vBl3Ec,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-08-11T05:45:36.518+0000)
>
> is this so you have time to check for bugs before the bigger servers have to experience them?

Actually if I was in there position that's what I'd be thinking and it makes total sense.

Yeah, we bear the burden of being the guinea pigs but if Riot are getting bug reports earlier than they otherwise would have, it means issues with patch releases get fixed that much quicker.

So it's good for Riot but also you now get to experience all the cool new updates/fixes/items that come along with patches a full 24 hours earlier than we used to. I feel like it's a pretty good trade off.
Why is Oce always in elo hell? Because we're down under :3{{champion:48}}
yeah thanks for the early patches and all but wheres dominion for oce? {{champion:6}}
Please make the Ocenia Servers as good as the other servers as well please.  this is a great step forward to hope riot will finally start serving all servers equally.
Tell me, what would you define as "equal treatment" of the servers in regards to OCE?
Probably thinks having all queues. Typical really.

I know why we don't have all queues.
I typically post in every thread that complains about OCE not having all queues saying why we don't have all queues.
rito im starting to love you and not cause of the game also remeber to update these basic skins on these champs {{champion:6}}  {{champion:83}}  {{champion:82}}  {{champion:3}} {{champion:96}}
Awesome news! I can't wait to play the new Skarner!
yah ok it's cool {{champion:157}}
So OCE gets to find and abuse bugs first :), also hello Agent Mindstar!
Thank you so much Riot. Every patch you always make your game better and better.
